info.title: HealthDesk Plus API
info.description: Comprehensive healthcare management system for doctors, patients, appointments, prescriptions, and medical records.

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive statistics for the doctor's dashboard including patient counts, appointment metrics, and practice analytics
